trait.name: Assassinate
entries: During her first turn, Ula has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn. Any hit Ula scores against a surprised creature is a critical hit.

trait.name: Evasion
entries: If Ula is subjected to an effect that allows her to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, Ula instead takes no damage if she succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: Ula deals an extra 14 ({@dice 4d6}) damage when she hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of Ula that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and Ula doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

trait.name: Nimble Escape
entries: Ula can take the {@action Disengage} or {@action Hide} action as a bonus action on each of her turns.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage, and the target must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking 24 ({@damage 7d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Light Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage, and the target must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking 24 ({@damage 7d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
Tiril's loyal spy, assassin and lover. She's an expert in the use of poisons and prefers subterfuge to direct confrontation.
